question: In which of the following pairs, both the elements do not have <katex>$(n-1)d^{10}ns^{2}$</katex> configuration?
explanation: Zn, Cd, Hg belong to group 12 and have general config <katex>$(n-1)d^{10}ns^2$</katex>.
Cu (<katex>$3d^{10}4s^1$</katex>) and Ag (<katex>$4d^{10}5s^1$</katex>) do not have <katex>ns^2</katex>.
